infotexts.jobdescription.fad_cook: Cooks, well, cook. A submarine needs food, and usually you want someone to be good at cooking doing that.
infotexts.entitydescription.cookhat: A hat that signifies the ship cook, by right of looking ridiculous.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_compatpill: Provides compatibility for mods that override the Human character. Should not be used if nothing's overriding Human. Adds +3 Hunger and +3 Thirst.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_coffeebean: A coffee bean genetically modified to survive better on Europa.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_smlcookingstation: A device for cooking food and making drinks.
A device for cooking food and making drinks. Place with Aim+Use.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_crawlermeat: Slimy and smells like rotted meat. Doesn't look particularly edible.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_molochmeat: Meat harvested from a Moloch. Shouldn't be eaten raw, but might be useful in cooking.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_waterbottle: Europan Spring branded water, brought to you by the people behind Crawler Cola. May not actually be spring water.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_coffee: A caffeine-filled drink with a legacy dating back centuries.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_beer: A beer, with some methanol for taste in the classic Europan style.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_rationbar: Though its edibility is debatable, ration bars will keep you alive.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_hqrationbar: Despite looking significantly like dirt, these are surprisingly tasty.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_baguette: A poor Europan reproduction of an Earth baguette. Should not be consumed through any orifice other than the mouth.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_cookie: Just like Grandma Mudraptor used to make.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_huskcaviar: Supposedly the high class of Europa eat these slimy platters of previously lethal husk eggs.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_curry: Unfortunately, the ingredients to create curry don't grow well on Europa, so instead this is made from elastin plants, which gives it a certain chewy texture.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_mudraptorscramble: Surprisingly tasty, if a little slimy.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_crawlersteak: This meat resembles nothing to what it previously did - it smells quite nice and looks delicious.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_molochsushi: Slightly squishy, but looks like a good snack.
